/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding vibrancy to the urban landscape. 

Trees line the street, their lush green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. Lampposts stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in a warm glow as dusk falls. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. 

The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding texture to the expansive canvas. The image is bathed in natural light, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
